markdownRemark.html:
This is the way to go. Nice work Greg! I set this up on a debian machine. Here's what I did:

  1. Copied the index.php.txt file to a web accessible directory
  2. Then added "/etc/pear/pear.conf" to index.php for the optional pear conf file
  3. Then I chowned /use/share/php to www-data.

Now we can go channel surfing for packages! Woo-hoo!
